DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: BRUST, M. R.;BRUST, MATTHIAS R.;BRUST, MATTHIAS

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: M.S. degree from the University of Trier (Germany), Ph.D. degree from the University of Luxembourg (Luxembourg), postdoc at the Aeronautics Institute of Technology (Brazil); research associate and visiting researcher at the University of Central Florida (UCF). Currently, visiting researcher at Aeronautics Institute of Technology (Brazil). Research interests: Communication networks, small-world networks, wireless sensor networks, mobile multi-hop ad hoc networks, topology control, clustering algorithms, complex and social networks, self-organizing systems, local algorithms, convergency models, epistemology and scientific methodologies.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: master's at Computer Science from University of Trier (2002) and doctorate at Computer Science from University of Luxembourg (2007). Has experience in Computer Science, focusing on Computer Science
